name: Apollo
description:
In this 2D retro space shooter, fight against the enemy to collect fuel for your ship. You can play as multiple different ships with different weapons and attributes. This game is inspired by classic space shooters and arcade games.

This game is filled with explosions, bullets, ships, colors & awful art.

Hope you all enjoy and you can give me feedback and report bugs @ Twitter.com/Wolves_Arkade

You can also support me here! patreon.com/whitewolf
